thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Saturday, 21 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Russia calls on U.S., South Korea to cut military activity after North Korean move

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Russia calls on U.S., South Korea to cut military activity after North Korean move
text:
MOSCOW (Reuters) - The Russian Foreign Ministry on Saturday welcomed an announcement by North Korea that it will halt nuclear and missile tests and called on the United States and South Korea to reduce their military activity in the region.
Reporting by Maria Kiselyova; Editing by Alexander Smith
